description:
# Audit Log Enhanced Search & Alerts

Enhance audit log capabilities with full-text search, advanced filtering, saved search queries, and configurable alerts for suspicious activity patterns (e.g., excessive searches for same user, after-hours access).

## Rationale
Security teams need sophisticated audit log analysis for incident investigation and compliance. Okta's 'audit tools under development' (pain-okta-5) shows competitors still catching up. WhoDis can lead with comprehensive audit capabilities. Real-time alerts enable proactive security response.

## User Stories
- As a security analyst, I want to search audit logs for specific patterns so that I can investigate potential security incidents
- As a compliance officer, I want alerts on suspicious activity so that I can respond promptly to policy violations

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Full-text search across all audit log fields
- [ ] Advanced filters: Date range, Event type, User, IP, Search query pattern
- [ ] Saved searches for frequently used filters
- [ ] Alert rules configurable in admin panel
- [ ] Alert triggers: Excessive searches for single user, After-hours access, Failed access attempts
- [ ] Alert notifications via in-app notification and email
- [ ] Alert history with acknowledgment tracking
